lines: An older sexy lady named LENA walks up to Aaron.  Aldous puts  *his arm around her like they’re a couple.*
You better be good to my boy.  Keep him out of trouble.
Aldous and Lena KISS on the lips.
Do you and the boys want any tea?
Yours of course with several extra lumps.  Aldy’s always liked his tea with several extra lumps.
I like it sweet like my mum.
And tea and chocolate Hobnobs are served.
Aldous and Aaron are accompanied out the door by his mom.
You have a safe trip, you hear?
Aldous and Lena hug.  Aldous starts tearing up.
There’s just too much love in this world.  It’s overwhelming.
What a sensitive lad.  Keep an eye on him, Aaron of Los Angeles.
